replies.bodyText: I added the ErrorCollector, but not all of the files are deleted (like statsstats.gfs file).  The statsstats.gfs file doesn't have to be deleted, though.  We wrapped the FileUtils.forceDelete(each); method line with a if (!each.getName().contains(".gfs")) since that file doesn't have to be deleted.  Let me know what you think!
